item.title: S&P 500 Hits All-Time High: What Does It Mean?
item.description: The S&P 500 has soared past 6,100 to a new record. Kurumi cheers for the dual engines of AI-driven earnings and easing geopolitical risks, while Mikael warns of Dot-com bubble valuations and ‘Extreme Greed.’ Is it time to hit the accelerator, or should you be looking for the emergency exit?
